子弹数量为空时下次装填额外加装1发子弹.en: When reload from empty,gain 1 addition ammo

造成法术伤害时附带相当于<@ba.vup>8%</>伤害的<$ba.dt.bur.en: When dealing Arts damage, deals an additional <@ba.vup>8%</> as <$ba.dt.burning2>Burn damage</>

技能可以使敌人产生<@ba.kw>位移</>，向自身拖拽较远的敌人时力度提升一个.en:
Can <@ba.kw>Shift</> enemies by using skills, increases shift level by 1 when dragging further away targets towards this unit 
Can be deployed on Ranged Tiles

周围8格没有友方干员时攻击力和防御力<@ba.kw>+8%</>.en: Gains +8% ATK and DEF when there are no allied units in the surrounding 8 tiles
